metadata.title: CVE-2024-53197 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ALSA: usb-audio: Fix potential out-of-bound accesses for Extigy and Mbox devices  A bogus device can provide a bNumConfigurations value that exceeds the initial value used in usb_get_configuration for allocating dev->config.  This can lead to out-of-bounds accesses later, e.g. in usb_destroy_configuration.
